OpenType Feature Support

A list of app versions and their supported features.

ADOBE

App ss01-ss20 liga
Photoshop1 ✅ ✅

1 Stylistic set (ssXX) at least since version 25.11.0

Microsoft

App kern liga
PowerPoint -/- -/-
Word ✅ 1 ✅

1 Kerning is turned off by default, therefore must be turned on if needed.
